About Me GitHub

Rubandass Jhondass

software graduate

Graduate with A+ overall average in Graduate Diploma in Information Technology (in 2020) from Otago Polytechnic, and first class in Mechanical Engineering from India. A technology enthusiast with passion for continuous learning. Has experience as a Software Test Engineer in India (for 9 years) and Software Development Intern in New Zealand. Developed five web-based applications and two mobile applications. A permanent resident in New Zealand.

Fitness Tracking System

This project aimed at recording student attendance in lectures and labs at Otago Polytechnic. A lecturer can record whether a student attended a session and can edit and save the attendance details. The lecturer can track the overall attendance (how many sessions a student has attended). It is a serverless project (no back-end). Data is stored in the local storage.

  • Technologies used: Jekyll static site generator, Javascript, HTML, CSS
  • Deployment link: https://bitattendance-rubandass.netlify.app
Repository

Gapminder data visualisation

This project describes data visualisation of data of about 200 countries that were fetched from gapminder.org. Different types of country-specific data (e.g., population, GDP, and industrial growth) are visualised using multiple bar charts. Two versions of the same project were developed using two different sets of technologies 1) Flask, MongoDB, and D3.js and 2) Node.js and React.

  • Technologies for version 1 : Python, Flask framework, MongoDB, D3.js, Javascript, HTML, CSS
  • Technologies for version 2 : Node.js, React.js, Javascript, HTML, CSS
Repository

Quiz Tournament

This project aimed at creating several quiz tournaments. Users can check tournaments that are ongoing, upcoming, previously participated and missed. When a user participates in a tournament, 10 questions are dynamically fetched from OpenTDB API. The system was designed to handle user-specific and admin-specific activities.

  • Technologies used: Python, Django framework, MySQL, Javascript, HTML, CSS
Repository

Language Translator

This project converts English sentences or words to the selected language. Currently it supports German, Spanish, French, and Italian languages. It also provides vocal pronunciation of the translated text. It uses Yandex API for text translation.

  • Technologies used: Android studio, Kotlin language
  • Google Play Store deployment: https://play.google.com/store/jhonr1_language_translator
Repository
